definition: to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces

sentences.english: On the top of the Acropolis is the Parthenon.
sentences.chinese: 卫城的顶端是怕台农神庙。

sentences.english: And Rehoboam rested with his fathers and was buried with them in the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 罗波安与他列祖同睡，葬在大卫城他列祖的坟地里。

sentences.english: He died and was buried with his fathers in the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 众人将他葬在大卫城他列祖的坟地里。

sentences.english: The first stop on most excursions is the Parthenon on the hill of the Acropolis.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数游览的第一站是在雅典卫城帕特农神庙山。

sentences.english: The Spartans withdrew their garrison from the Athenian Acropolis, and democracy was restored.
sentences.chinese: 斯巴达人从雅典卫城撤回驻军，民主得以恢复。

sentences.english: From the top of the unexcavated acropolis, I had a bird's eye view of the whole city.
sentences.chinese: 我从还未开挖的卫城高处俯瞰这整座失落的城市。

sentences.english: The Acropolis is the focal point of Athens.
sentences.chinese: 雅典卫城的缩写，是一种民主的象征。

sentences.english: Then Jehoshaphat rested with his fathers and was buried with them in the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 约沙法与他列祖同睡，葬在大卫城他列祖的坟地里。

sentences.english: Ye have seen also the breaches of the city of David, that they are many: and ye gathered together the waters of the lower pool.
sentences.chinese: 你们看见大卫城的破口很多，便聚积下池的水。

sentences.english: Jehoram rested with his fathers and was buried with them in the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 约兰与他列祖同睡，葬在大卫城他列祖的坟地里。

sentences.english: Ahaz rested with his fathers and was buried with them in the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 亚哈斯与他列祖同睡，葬在大卫城他列祖的坟地里。

sentences.english: Azariah rested with his fathers and was buried near them in the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 亚撒利雅与他列祖同睡，葬在大卫城他列祖的坟地里。

sentences.english: Then David rested with his fathers and was buried in the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 大卫与他列祖同睡，葬在大卫城。

sentences.english: Liapis visited the site of the new Acropolis Museum Monday.
sentences.chinese: 利亚比斯星期一参观了新建的卫城博物馆。

sentences.english: On one occasion Ven. Ananda was staying near Savatthi in Jeta's Grove, Anathapindika's monastery.
sentences.chinese: 一时，尊者阿难住在舍卫城附近的祇树给孤独精舍。

sentences.english: Take a break at the museum's nice outdoor cafe before you trek up the Acropolis hill.
sentences.chinese: 在博物馆室外咖啡厅休息一下，然后我们向卫城前行。

definition: Dacheng county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei/Tacheng township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
capital of 府 prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)/prefectural seat
Tucheng city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Shuicheng county in Liupanshui 六盤水|六盘水[Liu4 pan2 shui3], Guizhou
enceinte of a city gate/barbican entrance to a city
an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names
